SEARCH
Package Final.Recipe_book

Class IngredientManager

java.lang.Object
Final.Recipe_book.IngredientManager
public class IngredientManager extends Object
Manages the storage and manipulation of ingredients both locally and by default settings.

      the calorie count per cup of the ingredient if it exists, null otherwise.
